title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" — easy, light, and made to glide

- Easy to lift: Weighs only about 5.6 pounds. Light for most people to pick up and place under the seat.
- Fits under most airplane seats: About 22" long, 8" wide, and 15" high. Perfect for a short 1–3 day trip.
- Rolls smoothly: Four double spinner wheels turn 360 degrees. They roll quietly and don’t tip over.
- Strong shell: Tough ABS hard shell resists bumps and scratches, so it looks good trip after trip.
- Comfortable handle: Soft, easy‑grip top handle. Pull handle adjusts to your height and locks in place.
- Safe and secure: TSA-approved lock helps keep your things safe during travel.
- Organized inside: Mesh zip pocket and elastic straps keep clothes and small items neat. Full-capacity design uses space well.
- Built to last: Steel frame and rod for extra strength.

Good for:
- Weekend visits, short vacations, or hospital stays.
- Anyone who wants a small, simple bag that’s easy to move and store.

Color choices:
- Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple.

Plain-language tips:
- To open: Slide the lock switch and unzip.
- To roll: Stand the bag up, press the button on the pull handle, lift it, and walk—no need to tilt much.
- To store under seat: Lay the bag flat with wheels facing the aisle side.
- To keep items in place: Use the elastic straps and the mesh zip pocket for smaller things like glasses, medicines, or chargers.

Travelhouse Underseat Carry On: simple, sturdy, and easy to handle, so your trip feels smoother from door to door.
